name: Tree-Nation for WooCommerce
author: Tree-Nation

sections.description:
This integration will allow you to offer a tree each time a customer buys a product using WooCommerce.
1 tree will be offered for each product purchase. For example, if a user makes 1 purchase which includes 2 x Product A and 3 x Product B, this user will receive an email with his 5 trees offered by your brand.

Some options are available:
* Limit to some specific products: specify which products will trigger a tree planted, instead of all products.
* Limit to 1 (or X) tree per order: a purchase of 5 products will only generate 1 tree.

Once you completed this integration, the system will be 100% automated.

Total integration takes less than 10 minutes on your side ðŸ™‚

General website: Tree-Nation
WooCommerce integration: Tree-Nation Auto-Offer

Support

Contact us at auto-offer@tree-nation.com if you encounter any problem with this plugin.
sections.installation:
Upload the Tree-Nation for WooCommerce plugin to your site, activate it, and then enter your Tree-Nation ID on the settings page.
Find here our complete installation guide.

Requirements:
* The WooCommerce plugin needs to be installed in your WordPress site and up to date.
* Youâ€™ll need to have a Tree-Nation ID from your Tree-Nation account.
sections.changelog:
1.6

Release Date – 22 July 2024
Updated to support HPOS and tested on WP version 6.5.5

1.5

Release Date – 29 January 2023

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.1.1

1.4

Release Date – 25 October 2021

  • Fixed bug on preventing duplicated webhooks that deleted other configured webhooks
  • Tested up to WordPress 5.8.1

1.3

Release Date – 20 August 2020

  • Tested up to WordPress 5.5

1.2

Release Date – 18 June 2020

  • Fixed a problem where the internal webhook url was being parsed incorrectly

1.1

Release Date – 25 February 2020

  • First release
